scripts.delete-all-reports-local: rimraf cypress/reports && rimraf cypress/screenshots && rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report
scripts.delete-all-reports: rm -rf cypress/reports && rm -rf cypress/screenshots && rm -rf allure-results && rm -rf allure-report
scripts.smoke-pack: npm run delete-all-reports && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/smokeTest/*.cy.js' --headed --browser chrome
scripts.regression-pack: npm run delete-all-reports && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/regression/*.cy.js' --headed --browser chrome
scripts.test-with-allure: npm run delete-all-reports && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/regression/*.cy.js' --headed --browser chrome && npm run npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test-with-allure-local: npm run delete-all-reports-local && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/regression/*.cy.js' --headed --browser chrome && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-reports
